nodes.text: Lyran was a world in the galaxy where Chass na Chadic, pilot in the New Republic's Alphabet Squadron, had once visited. Several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Chadick and her squadron visited a Jedi temple on the moon of the planet Harkrova I, where they found a holographic map of the galaxy. Chadick recognized Lyran in this map.
Lyran first appeared via hologram in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
